browserActionLabelDefault.description: Label of the button before the extension has loaded completely.

browserActionLabelOff.description: Label of the button when the extension is disabled.
browserActionLabelOff.message: Skip Redirect är inaktiverad, tryck för att aktivera

browserActionLabelOn.description: Label of the button when the extension is enabled.
browserActionLabelOn.message: Skip Redirect är aktiverad, tryck för att inaktivera

extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension in the add-on manager.
extensionDescription.message: Hoppa över mellanliggande sidor som en del sidor använder innan de omdirigeras till målsidan.

extensionName.description: Name of the extension in the add-on manager.

optionsModeNoSkipUrlsList.description: The choice that sets the extension into no-skip-urls-list mode.
optionsModeNoSkipUrlsList.message: Hoppa över alla omdirigeringar utom webbadresser som matchar någon av raderna i svartlistan.

optionsModeOff.description: The choice that disables the extension.

optionsModeSkipUrlsList.description: The choice that sets the extension into skip-urls-list mode.
optionsModeSkipUrlsList.message: Hoppa över omdirigeringar endast för webbadresser som matchar någon av raderna i vitlistan.

optionsNoSkipParametersListContent.description: Label of the text area to edit the no-skip-parameters-list.
optionsNoSkipParametersListContent.message: Svartlista för url parameter (du kan använda reguljära uttryck)

optionsNoSkipUrlsListContent.description: Label of the text area to edit the no-skip-urls-list.

optionsSectionMode.description: Title of the options section allowing to toggle between no-skip-urls-list and skip-urls-list or disable the extension.

optionsSectionSync.description: Title of the options section allowing to control Sync.

optionsSkipRedirectsToSameDomain.description: Label of the checkbox that toggles skipping to the same public domain.
optionsSkipRedirectsToSameDomain.message: Hoppa över omdirigeringar för webbadresser med samma offentliga domän

optionsSkipUrlsListContent.description: Label of the text area to edit the skip-urls-list.

optionsSyncExplanation.message: Sync uses your browser's sync account and you need to enable sync for extensions/add-ons in your browser's preferences before enabling it here. The browser controls when data is actually synced and modifications on different devices might get lost if they happen over a short period.

optionsSyncListsEnable.description: Label of the checkbox to toggle Sync.

redirectSkippedBrowserActionBadge.description: Text of the badge shown on the button after a redirect was skipped.
